texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: MySQL has quite a few cryptic error messages, and this one is one of the best:
texts.text: MySQL has quite a few cryptic error messages, and this one is one of the best:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
mysql> DROP USER 'forums'@'db1.myserver.com';
ERROR 1268 (HY000): Can't drop one or more of the requested users
texts.text:
mysql> DROP USER 'forums'@'db1.myserver.com';
ERROR 1268 (HY000): Can't drop one or more of the requested users

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Naturally, I was quite interested to know why MySQL wasn't going to allow me to remove this user. There was nothing special about the user, but then again, this wasn't a server that I personally managed, so I wasn't sure what kind of configuration was in place.
texts.text: Naturally, I was quite interested to know why MySQL wasn't going to allow me to remove this user. There was nothing special about the user, but then again, this wasn't a server that I personally managed, so I wasn't sure what kind of configuration was in place.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's always a good idea to get your bearings, so I checked the current grants:
texts.text: It's always a good idea to get your bearings, so I checked the current grants:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The GRANT OPTION was causing my grief. It was the only privilege that the user had on the server. I revoked the privilege and attempted to drop the user yet again:
texts.text: The GRANT OPTION was causing my grief. It was the only privilege that the user had on the server. I revoked the privilege and attempted to drop the user yet again:

texts.label: code
paragraph
texts.orig: It's key to remember that revoking the GRANT OPTION is a completely separate process. Revoking ALL PRIVILEGES doesn't include GRANT OPTION, so be sure to specify it separately:
texts.text: It's key to remember that revoking the GRANT OPTION is a completely separate process. Revoking ALL PRIVILEGES doesn't include GRANT OPTION, so be sure to specify it separately:

texts.label: code
texts.orig: mysql> REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES, GRANT OPTION ON *.* FROM 'user'@'host';
texts.text: mysql> REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES, GRANT OPTION ON *.* FROM 'user'@'host';
